title: How to avoid Noobs ?
body:
OK I started the game and was doing fine until my team mate graves was overcamped by warwick i told him to just ward the jungle and play safe use your map... then top lane trundle also started inting he was literally had no damage on their adc till end of the game ... 
i thought if i play well i can carry their asses but no they wont let me becoz they want to lose ,, what can i say more if i say in chat tht they are doing wrong GG they reply reported ,, i mean wtf is chat for ,,,,, i only show them their mistakes and in return they reporte me without any reason!!!!

No matter how much harder i try to win the game these players wont allow me to do so .
So i reported them for griefing and giving up and verbal abuse .. do they really get bans ??

And why a player like me of such caliber is placed in this low elo que where players are like monkeys they dont know what they are playing and for what purpose .... 

i dont know how to put screenshots on a website so if u guys can help out >>

replies.body:
> And why a player like me of such caliber 

Zed/Yasuo spammer with pretty mediocre stats.. Why do they always think they are so good?

Why are they always toxic whiners?

I'm a Zed main just finished ranked games and in Silver 5 final game in provision game my team was horrible I had 1 / 4 jungler and my bot lane was together 5 / 14 I was the only one winning and I had to blame my team for it my, my top lane was the worst he was 1 / 9, my jungler most toxic like heavy acid and me I was only 6 / 5 I had flamed my entire team for fucking up so hard. I agree but sometimes you have a reason to be.

to avoid the noobs it is extremely simple.

Become the greatest noob League of Legends has ever seen!! 
Once you achieve this everybody else will be less of a noob than you and thus be considered God Tier in comparison.

No more noobs. At least from your perspective anyway.

ur a noob urself. 

You dont know how to close out a game 

Even with a scoreline of 15 / 1 / 12

The game lasted 40 minutes (Shouldnt happen)
and you had 52% kill participation. Half the things that your team does, is without you. 

It really just sounds like you dont know how to apply pressure and where to apply it. You do nothing but get pointless kills, the game drags on too long, and you lose.
Let someone else play, so you don't look at a reflective surface.

I took a screen shot of a game of yours that matches what you described happen. I don't know why I did though to be honest, just bored. x3

Image link: [Imgur](https://imgur.com/Gt56eSA)

I'm a noob myself, but isn't that a blind pick game? Says normal but Jhin is on both teams. And, this is just a guess, but do you rage on your teammates all game? Rarely does that help team synergy or help them play better. Type less, ping more. The game posted isn't ranked anyway. Losses happen man, why rage on blind pick teammates?
